idea-plugin.name: BugKotlinDocument
idea-plugin.description: To generate document in Kotlin File
idea-plugin.change-notes:
//Too young version: v0.1 (Only `@param`s are available)
A simple version :v0.1.1 (solve mul-match `/**` problem) and reduce the whole package so it's small enough now (the fact is that I forgot to remove the Gradle so that the first version remains 16MB.)
